text: Wo jinzhi youtai jiaotu chi yiqie ti wei fencheng ban de dongwu, hai jinzhi tamen chi niu yang de zhifang, chufei na shi fu zai bei shang, huo neizang shang, huo yu gutou hunzai yiqi de. Wo ruci yin tamen de beini [ru wangtu shahai xianzhimen yu chi gaolidai deng] er chengfa tamen. Wo que shi chengshi de.
